name: Thatcher May
title: Trimmer
coverLetter:
To whom it may concern,


I'm writing to express interest in a future position as a trimmer. I have great interest in the cannabis industry, especially in the growing and harvesting aspects. I have worked in many different environments, I have worked as a customer service specialist, an audio/visual technician, a restaurant delivery person, and as a touring musician, to name a few. I love to learn new things, work hard, and accomplish tasks to the best of my ability.


I would be very willing and eager to learn the ins and outs of the cannabis industry and become a part of the change.
experience:
Museum of Science, Boston, MA — Visitor Services Specialist

December 2016 - August 2017

  • Managed selling a variety of ticket packages to guests ranging from individual to large groups based on their specific interests.
  • Efficiently handled collecting money and making accurate change on transactions in a fast-paced setting.
  • Ensured safety was maintained in various Museum attractions, such as the Thrill Ride 360 and Omni.


Caviar — Courier

September 2016 - Present

  • Act as a consistently positive representative of the company to a variety of clientele.
  • Self-motivated to execute high-volume of orders while meeting strict deadlines.
  • Proven ability to remain courteous and calm, even during moments of customer displeasure.


Mother Juice, Cambridge, MA — Juicer

August 2014 - August 2015

  • Managed the preparation and organization of all juice to be sold on a daily basis.
  • Responsible for following policy and closing the store in a compliant manner.
  • Ensured required protocol was followed while cleaning the storefront each night.
